description: Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party (and later the People`s Republic of China) between 1943 and his death in 1976. After growing annoyed with the incompetent leadership of modern China, Mao rises from the grave and challenges Koizumi to a game of Mah Jong. He uses an `all green` hand and his score is reflected by having China gradually convert into a gigantic rice field. Appears only in the anime.
name: Mao Zedong
